one:
It’s the snake without the rattle
It’s the boat without the paddle
It’s the duck without the waddle
It’s the horse without the saddle
It’s the ranch without the cattle
It’s the wars without the battle
It’s the tree without the apple
We should probably skedaddle
two:
Free to eat, wow that’s sweet
We got a beat, let’s beat the heat
Cross the street, enjoy the treat
Don’t have to cheat, take out a sheet
Jot this down, we’re out of town
Can’t play around, it’s serious now
It will be found, through many rounds
Enjoy the sound, the final crown
